Seeking ex-post facto approval has been viewed seriously by the Competent Authority and it has been directed that ex-post facto approval will not be given in future except in cases where the circumstances precluded seeking approval 3. Divisions are, therefore , advised to ensure that in all cases approval of the Competent Authority may be obtained well in time. In cases, where ex-post facto approval is unavoidable, full justifications reasons for not obtaining prior approval may be submitted for consideration by the Competent Authority: sku (S.K.
